description.text: Here...some soul sand...you can $(b;spring)craft$() your $(b;winter)soul lantern$()...It's purpose? To locate more lost souls...Every $(b;winter)Soul Reaper$() has one...

description.translate:
Ah Mortal...You shouldn't express so much fear....
– The pixie pats you on the head – There, there, you have done well!!
Your soul is safe with me! As long as you provide...
